WorkItem.Description: a small nit pick, but it would be great if VR Player remembered what file type you opened before and kept that setting. I only work with still images so I'm constantly having to change the file type from movies to images. Or maybe both could be combined?

Comments.Message:
Good idea, it's now in the back log!

Since 0.5.1, thanks to a contributor (Christophe Leske), you can also drag and drop files in the player. It works for images and videos.

-Stephane
